price: 在他们之前的人，确已说过这样的话了；但他们所获的财产，对于他们没有裨益，
arabic: قَدۡ قَالَهَا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: qad qālahā alladhīna min qablihim famā aghnā ʿanhum mā kānū yaksibūna
